name: sc-hub-function-connection
description: Represents a BACnet Secure Connect (SC) hub function connection, detailing connection state, timestamps, peer information, and errors.

fields.name: connection-state
fields.description: The current state of the SC hub function connection.

fields.name: connect-timestamp
fields.description: Timestamp when the connection was established.

fields.name: disconnect-timestamp
fields.description: Timestamp when the connection was disconnected.

fields.name: peer-address
fields.description: Network address of the peer device.

fields.name: peer-vmac
fields.description: Virtual MAC address of the peer device.

fields.name: error
fields.description: Error code if the connection failed. Optional.

fields.name: error-details
fields.description: Additional error details if available. Optional.
